tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Pradnya ma'am is an exceptional gynecologist whose expertise and compassion truly make a difference. From the moment I walked into their office, I felt welcomed and valued as a patient. Dr. Pradnya ma'am took the time to listen to my concerns, thoroughly explained my diagnosis and treatment options, and ensured I felt comfortable every step of the way. Their ********* *** skill are evident in the quality of care I received. I highly recommend Dr. Pradnya ma'am to anyone seeking top-notch medical care with a personal touch.

tags: None
review: I first met her when I got to know I was expecting. The way she guided me ahead was commendable. She took extra care as to reassure everything went smooth till my delivery. She was available over Whatsapp and call whenever needed. I was extremely panicked and anxious in this whole period  as I had a history of miscarriage. She gave me her ears whenever needed. We had a C-section and everything went smoothly as well. The post care was also wonderfully explained. I am extremely happy and satisfied with the entire journey to motherhood with her.  I would definitely recommend her.
reply_text: Thank you so much for your kind words dear. I am glad I could guide you through your journey to motherhood. It was an extreme pleasure to hand over your bundle of joy to you. May  God bless you and your little one.

tags: None
review:
I had huge growth in my stomach ( 23 cm,  4 kilos) which had to be removed and since it was adjoining the uterus and ovaries, all those organs also had to be removed. It was a major task and I needed a very good gynecologist. I was referred to Dr.Pradnya Changede in Savla hospital. 

Right from the beginning I noticed that Dr.Pradnya was extremely meticulous, cautious and diligent in the manner in which she handled the case.  From diagnosing to planning the surgery, performing the surgery to the post operative care and follow up, she was excellent in everything. Her guidance was impeccable. I could reach out to her with anything, anytime. 

I am now completely fine. Hugely grateful to Dr. Pradnya, who is also a dear friend today. I would recommend her to anyone and everyone. My prayers and best wishes to her. May God bless her and make her a blessing for many. üôèüèº
reply_text: Thank you so much for your kind words  and detailed review. Glad to help you in relieving the agony and pain that you underwent.  It was wonderful to see that amazing transformation that you underwent.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I have consulted Dr Pradnya for some gynaec problems. She is very knowledgeable and friendly. She lends a patient ear to your problems and gives perfect advice and treatment. My anxiety just disappeared after talking to her.
Extremely trustworthy and dependable doctor.
Highly recommended !

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: My delivery was done by Dr Pradnya. She is a highly responsive doctor. Available on call or text whenever required. Guided us through out the tenure very well. There were some complications, delivery had to be done prematurely at 35 weeks. She arranged everything merely in minutes and took extra care to make sure everything was done smoothly.
reply_text: Thank you for your kind words . Glad to be of help to you and your family.  Blessings to the little one !

tags: None

Doctor has asked all the question for me and explained the things in details. From her I am completely satisfied and I would like to recommend her for my friends and family to.
reply_text: Glad to hear that you benefited from the treatment.  Thank you for the kind words .

tags: None
review: Doctor Prandnya is an amazing doctor. I approached her for a severe UTI infection. In such a pandemic situation she not only ensure that her pateint gets best treatment but a positive energy. She will listen to your concerns and always open for discussion. Her ownership to treat her patients is remarkable. Glad to see such a wonderful Doctor. Thank You for everything!!
reply_text: Thank you so much for your kind words . I am glad you benefited  from the treatment. I truly understand  that the pandemic situation requires not only good treatment but  positive energy too for patients well-being. Thank you.
